antes.name: Shadow Assault
antes.text: Rising Action: Gain a pressure tokens and [Wait].

antes.name: Poisoned blades
antes.text: Action: Spend two pressure tokens to discard two enemy dice from play.

antes.name: Coup de Grace
antes.text: Rising Action: Counter one die from the enemy who passed you your turn, then [Take].

antes.name: Onslaught
antes.text: Rising Action: [Fight]. This turn, you may choose not to reroll any or all of your pushed dice.

antes.name: Shatter the Weak
antes.text: Action: [Fight]. After, if no enemy dice remain in play, you may discard one die from enemies’ Power. This turn, discard all pushed dice.

antes.name: Reckless Strength
antes.text: Commit: After you commit dice, discard your lowest die from play

antes.name: Vigilance
antes.text: Rising Action: Choose an ally. For the rest of this fight, you may also use Defiance to boost the effective number of dice that ally has in play. Then, [Fight].

antes.name: Guarded Strength
antes.text:
Commit: After you commit dice, move your 2 lowest dice in play to your Power.
Reaction: Move your lowest die in play to your Power and gain 2 pressure tokens.

antes.name: Staggering Shout
antes.text: Rising Action: You may push one die belonging to each enemy in the fight.

antes.name: Quickdraw
antes.text: Action: You may take this action on your first turn. Set a die in play to its maximum value.

antes.name: Trick Shot
antes.text: Action: Push a matching pair. Counter an enemy die showing a smaller face. You may choose to not reroll the pushed dice when you pass.

antes.name: Called Shot
antes.text: Rising Action: [Fight], then choose an enemy nonbasic Action they have unlocked this fight, or a Rising Action they have not. They cannot use this action for the rest of the fight.

antes.name: Judgment Cut
antes.text: Rising Action: Roll 4d4 into play.

antes.name: Summoned Swords
antes.text: Action: Push any number of dice. Gain 1 Pressure token for each matching pair of dice you push. A die can only be part of one pair (four 2s give 2 Pressure).

antes.name: Called Shot
antes.text: Action: Push a matched pair of dice. Discard up to three enemy dice equal to or less than the pair’s face.

antes.name: Overclock
antes.text: Action: Push one die then add 2 Pressure tokens. Next turn, [Rise] or lose the duel.

antes.name: Protocol: PURSUE
antes.text: Action: [Fight]. Ignore any abilities that would prevent you from countering dice. Then, give your opponent +1 Pressure.

antes.name: Barrage
antes.text: Passive: You discard your Pressure tokens if you or your opponent Commits.

antes.name: Snipe
antes.text: Action: Counter up to three dice with exactly matching faces. Do not reroll them when you [Pass].

antes.name: Constantine Cannon
antes.text: Action: [Fight]. When you reroll your pushed dice during your [Pass], convert any roll of 2 or 3 to 1 and any roll of 4 or 5 to 6.

antes.name: Reaper Form
antes.text:
Stance
Passive: Choose an enemy when you first commit this in a fight. Your dice count as being one face higher for countering that enemy's dice, and one face lower for countering anything else.

antes.name: Snake Form
antes.text:
Stance
Action: Push any number of dice. Counter a single enemy die showing a face equal to the sum of the pushed dice.
